ID: CINMFYW_00
From: Celine Kibrit <Celine.Kibrit@chalhoub.com>

CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-04 12:06
Subject: DOM-Guess
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Kindly advise on newly added insurance clause in Guess LA:

 

6.7.13 For the avoidance of doubt, in no event Landlord shall insure the Premises (as mentioned in item no. 3 of Exhibit-1) as, insuring such the Premises (as mentioned in item no. 3 of Exhibit-1) is the sole liability of the Tenant. In case of any conflict between clause 6.7.13 and clause 6.7.1 to 6.7.12, the clause 6.7.13 shall prevail. 

 

 

Thank you, 

Regards
